org.apache.sysds.runtime.compress.colgroup

Class ColGroupDDC1

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.sysds.runtime.compress.colgroup.ColGroup
      • org.apache.sysds.runtime.compress.colgroup.ColGroupValue
        • org.apache.sysds.runtime.compress.colgroup.ColGroupDDC
          • org.apache.sysds.runtime.compress.colgroup.ColGroupDDC1
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ColGroupDDC1
extends ColGroupDDC
    Class to encapsulate information about a column group that is encoded with dense dictionary encoding (DDC) using 1 byte codes.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public void rightMultByVector(double[] b,
                              double[] c,
                              int rl,
                              int ru,
                              double[] dictVals)
        Description copied from class: ColGroup
        Multiply the slice of the matrix that this column group represents by a vector on the right.
        Specified by:
        rightMultByVector in class ColGroup
        Parameters:
        b - vector to multiply by (tall vector)
        c - accumulator for holding the result
        rl - row lower
        ru - row upper if the internal SystemML code that performs the multiplication experiences an error
        dictVals - The dictionary values materialized
